Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit - Sydney Web Designer website

Complete Next.js 14 website with 11 pages and zero errors.

Features:
- 11 fully functional pages \(Homepage, About, Services, Portfolio, Testimonials, Blog, Careers, Pricing pages, Career Application\)
- Professional navy/orange design system
- Responsive mega menu with 20 services
- 4 popup form types for lead generation
- Portfolio cards with gradient backgrounds
- Blog cards with enhanced styling
- SEO optimized with Schema.org markup
- TypeScript throughout for type safety
- Tailwind CSS with custom design system
- Zero runtime errors, zero build errors

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
